name: Shapeheads
description:
Ever wanted to randomise an interesting looking face? Now's your chance!

Silly, scary, and everything in-between: randomise the faces, the names, the ID number, choose your style - go nuts, have fun! 

Save any faces by pressing F5, and post them in the comments below if you like!

See what faces you can make!

CREATED BY:

Jamer_theGamer, and ZVGrilled (https://zvgrilled.itch.io/)
